text: "Bang Bang" is a pop-soul ballad from Jessie J, Ariana Grande and Nicki Minaj. The song is about female empowerment, sex and feminism. The song was released on August 17, 2014 as the lead single from Jessie J's studio album Sweet Talker (2014). The song is also off Grande's album My Everything (2014). "Bang Bang" began at #1 in the United Kingdom. It hit the Top Ten in several countries, like Australia, Canada and the United States. It won Favorite Song of the Year at the 2015 Kids' Choice Awards on Nickelodeon. ==References== Category:Pop ballads Category:2014 songs Category:Ariana Grande songs Category:Nicki Minaj songs Category:Jessie J songs
title: Bang Bang (Jessie J, Ariana Grande and Nicki Minaj song)
